response.overview: Generation Palestine is a cultural documentary that follows dear friends and family as they discuss the culture of Palestine and what it means to them as individuals living in the diaspora. Director statement: "Growing up with a Palestinian Grandmother and many Palestinian friends, I have always had a deep love for their beautiful culture. My passion is to document the most incredibly authentic stories of resilience and strength, and to offer Palestinians the opportunity to express their true emotions towards their homeland and heritage. In doing so, I hope to educate others on the beauty, gentleness, warmth and community that is the Palestinian culture".
response.title: Generation Palestine
